alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Olmsted (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 6:16PM CDT until May 19 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN OLMSTED AND DODGE COUNTIES... At 615 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Dodge Center, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Emergency management reported pea sized hail near Dodge Center at 610 PM. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Byron around 625 PM CDT. Pine Island around 630 PM CDT. Oronoco around 635 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Ringe, Potsdam, Danesville, Eden, Highway 57 And 570th Street, County Roads 6 And 15 and Salem Corners. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern Minnesota. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
